search_results.title: Tell Me About My Birth Mother: A guided journal ...
search_results.snippet: Tell Me About My Birth Mother is a guided journal for birth mothers to pass along to their biological children after adoption.

search_results.title: Author Laura Engel talks about her birthmother memoir
search_results.snippet: This story of all the other young birth mothers and of myself and the love I had for my son had to be told. Even if nobody ever read it ...

search_results.title: Birth Mothers Are My Heroes
search_results.snippet: Birth mothers are my heroes. Our story begins with a birth mother choosing life for her baby, and then choosing us to raise her baby.
